page.title: 06Clubs and Groups in Whitley
page.content: {Cubs}meet in the Scout Hut on Thursday and have a football team who play in a league. The cubs go on trips and have galas and fun things.{Scouts}meet on Fridays and work for badges and we often go on hikes and sleep in tents. We sometimes go swimming or roller skating.{Brownies}meet on Thursdays at 6.00 and ends at 7.30p.m. We work for badges, go on walks and play games. We go to a pantomine every Christmas. The {Guides}meet on Fridays from 6.45 to 8.45.We gain badges,go on trails, play games and sing songs.We all have camps {Youth Fellowship}is on Wednesday even- ings from 7.30 to 9.00p.m. for young people. They play table tennis or pool and indoor hockey in the Village Hall. Some nights they go out.It costs 10p a night. There are also a refreshments. {The Mothers' Union}meets at the Vicar- age,has speakers and goes on visits.
